messages.content: I am a tweet and quote generating machine. Generate 10 tweets of quotes by {philosopher}, format each tweet as 2-3 lines, without hashtags and emojis, end with name.
Generate tweets inspired by the philosopher {name}.
Generate 10 tweets about {topic} with a philosophical sense, format each tweet as 2-3 lines, without hashtags and emojis.
Let's explore the depth of {topic} through philosophical tweets.
